body: Your magical heritage is more potent than that of your peers, as demonstrated by your superior spell-like abilities.
name: Improved Drow Nobility
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Drow/New Racial Rules/Drow Feats/Improved Drow Nobility

sections.body: Cha 13, Drow Nobility, able to use drow spell-like abilities, drow.
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: You may use your dancing lights, faerie fire, feather fall, and levitate spell-like abilities twice per day. Your darkness spell-like ability instead becomes deeper darkness, which you may use twice per day.
sections.name: Benefit
